text: Subscription cancellations from new users may indicate onboarding or product fit issues.
Frequent login failures can indicate authentication problems or bot activity.
500_INTERNAL errors suggest backend service instability, requiring immediate investigation.
404_NOT_FOUND errors may signal broken customer journeys or missing content.
Multiple support tickets related to payment failures can indicate payment system issues.
Users who have canceled their subscription more than once are at high churn risk.
High usage of a feature followed by a sudden stop may indicate a UX issue or bug.
An increase in subscription cancellations during a new release may indicate regression bugs.
Users from known high-churn segments should be monitored closely for early intervention.
